attributes.value: Has a negative view of those who exercise power over others
Finds the following of tradition foolish and limiting
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Sees perseverance in the face of adversity as bull-headed and foolish
Never feels discouraged
Rarely looks on others with lust
Is impervious to the effects of stress
Is very polite and observes appropriate rules of decorum when possible
Has great trouble mastering fear when confronted by danger
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Does not find most jokes humorous
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Is a pessimist
Is very rarely moved by curiosity
Is generally unhindered by the thoughts of others concerning her actions
Tends to be a bit stubborn in changing her mind about things
Feels helping others is an imposition on her time
Lives at a slow-going and leisurely pace
Flimsy
Susceptible to disease
